Package streamprocessor

Class ProcessorFactory

java.lang.Object
streamprocessor.ProcessorFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Function<String,Stream<String>>
public class ProcessorFactory extends Object implements Function<String,Stream<String>>
Creator of Processor boxes based on the content os strings and previous Strings.
Author:
Pieter van den Hombergh <pieter.van.den.hombergh@gmail.com>

      public Processor processorFor(String line)
      Create a processor box for the given line. Processor.apply will produce a Stream<String> with 0 1 or more lines.
      Parameters:
      line - for the processor.
      Returns:
      a processor for the line.

    • apply

      public Stream<String> apply(String line)
      Apply the creation of a processor and applying its effect on the input string. Collapses two mappings into 1.
      Specified by:
      apply in interface Function<String,Stream<String>>
      Parameters:
      line - to process, remove or replace.
      Returns:
      The result of the processor box applied
